snippet: KELLMAN--Lillian Strauss, librarian and storyteller, died at age 89 this week in her home on Martha's Vineyard. She died peacefully surrounded by her loved ones after battling cancer. She celebrated her 70th wedding anniversary with her loving husband Ray and family in July 2015. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KELLMAN--Lillian Strauss, librarian and storyteller, died at age 89 this week in her home on Martha's Vineyard. She died peacefully surrounded by her loved ones after battling cancer. She celebrated her 70th wedding anniversary with her loving husband Ray and family in July 2015. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KELLMAN, LILLIAN STRAUSS
